verses.name: Matthew 15:16
verses.text: And Jesus said, Are ye also yet without understanding?

verses.name: Matthew 15:17
verses.text: Do not ye yet understand, that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly, and is cast out into the draught?

verses.name: Matthew 15:18
verses.text: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart; and they defile the man.

verses.name: Matthew 15:19
verses.text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts, murders, adulteries, fornications, thefts, false witness, blasphemies:

verses.name: Matthew 15:20
verses.text: These are the things which defile a man: but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man.

verses.name: Matthew 15:21
verses.text: Then Jesus went thence, and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon.
